trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Contiene una raccolta di <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The PropertyInformationCollection object contains a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> objects.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto PropertyInformationCollection contiene una raccolta di <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation>oggetti.</xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> object contains the details of an individual attribute within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation>oggetto contiene i dettagli di un singolo attributo all'interno della configurazione.</xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation>

trans-unit.source: The PropertyInformationCollection object is derived from the associated <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> object.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto PropertyInformationCollection è derivato da associato <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>oggetto.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia l'intero <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> insieme a una matrice unidimensionale compatibile <xref:System.Array>, a partire dall'indice specificato della matrice di destinazione.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice unidimensionale <xref:System.Array>che rappresenta la destinazione degli elementi copiati dal <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> insieme.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Array>deve avere un'indicizzazione in base zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero `array` da cui avviare la copia.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: The property of array is less than + index.
trans-unit.target: The <>*> property of array is less than <>*> + index.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object, which is used to iterate through this <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>oggetto, che viene utilizzato per scorrere l'oggetto <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> insieme.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object, which is used to iterate through this <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>oggetto, che viene utilizzato per scorrere l'oggetto <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Popola un <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> oggetto con i dati necessari per serializzare il <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that contains the information required to serialize the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> oggetto che contiene le informazioni necessarie per serializzare il <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>oggetto che contiene l'origine e la destinazione del flusso serializzato associato il <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> istanza.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object in the collection, based on the specified property name.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"> </xref> oggetto nella raccolta, in base al nome della proprietà specificata.

trans-unit.source: The name of the configuration attribute contained in the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'attributo di configurazione contenuto nel <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object.
